parameters.name: Bodies
parameters.description: Array of solid bodies to save as parts (See Remarks)

parameters.name: FilePaths
parameters.description: Array of solid bodies to save as parts (See Remarks)

parameters.name: AssemName
parameters.description: Array of paths and filenames of the part documents to which to save Bodies

parameters.name: ConsumeBody
parameters.description: Array of paths and filenames of the part documents to which to save Bodies

parameters.name: CopyCustomProperty
parameters.description: Path and filename of the assembly document to which to save Bodies

title: IFeatureManager.CreateSaveBodyFeature
description: Creates a Save Bodies feature and creates part and assembly documents of the save bodies.
signature:
System.Object CreateSaveBodyFeature( 
   System.Object
Bodies
,
   System.Object
FilePaths
,
   System.String
AssemName
,
   System.Boolean
ConsumeBody
,
   System.Boolean
CopyCustomProperty
)

parameters.name: Bodies
parameters.description: Array of solid bodies to save as parts (See Remarks)

parameters.name: FilePaths
parameters.description: Array of solid bodies to save as parts (See Remarks)

parameters.name: AssemName
parameters.description: Array of paths and filenames of the part documents to which to save Bodies

parameters.name: ConsumeBody
parameters.description: Array of paths and filenames of the part documents to which to save Bodies

parameters.name: CopyCustomProperty
parameters.description: Path and filename of the assembly document to which to save Bodies

remarks:
If any solid bodies in Bodies are invalid, they are skipped/ignored.
For parameter...
Specify...
ConsumeBody
VARIANT_TRUE (-1) to consume all bodies in the original part, VARIANT_FALSE (0) to not
CopyCustomProperty
VARIANT_TRUE (-1) to copy custom properties to the new parts, VARIANT_FALSE (0) to not

examples.title: Create Save Bodies Feature and Create an Assembly (VBA)
